General.Name: Afluente Transmissão de Energia Elétrica S.A
General.Description: Afluente Transmissão de Energia Elétrica S.A. operates transmission lines and sub-stations in Bahia, Brazil. It operates substations of Tomba, Funil, Brumado II, Itagibai, Ford, Palo, and camacari in the state of Bahia with an installed capacity of 600 MVA and transmission line of 489.1 kilometers. The company was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Rio De Janeiro, Brazil. Afluente Transmissão de Energia Elétrica S.A. is a subsidiary of Neoenergia S.A.
General.Address: Praia do Flamengo, 78, Rio De Janeiro, RJ, Brazil
